EmailTemplate.name: Global_Webinar_Attunity/Wellcare_Q215.Follow Up - Attended
EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for Joining Us!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
We hope you enjoyed our Customer Spotlight webinar <https://pivotal.io/big-data/webinar/healthcare-success-story-wellcare>, How WellCare Accelerated Big Data Delivery to Improve Analytics.
This session featured speakers from WellCare, Attunity and Pivotal discussing how WellCare uses Attunity Replicate <http://www.attunity.com/products/attunity-replicate> to offload data quickly and easily from its SQL Server and Oracle systems into Pivotal Greenplum Database <https://pivotal.io/big-data/pivotal-greenplum-database> to support real-time reporting and analytics.
For more about the technologies that were discussed in the webinar, check out these resources:
- Pivotal Greenplum Database Datasheet <https://pivotal.io/big-data/datasheet/pivotal-greenplum-database> - Attunity Replicate Whitepaper <http://learn.attunity.com/why-attunity-replicate-is-the-better-alternative-1> - Attunity Replicate for Pivotal Solution Sheet <http://www.attunity.com/sites/default/files/content/attunity-replicate-for-pivotal-solution-sheet.pdf> - Value of Partnering Video <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rRubhsBI1Fc>
Please feel free to share the on-demand replay <https://youtu.be/ZYiwRUxlY2s> of the webinar and the slides <http://www.slideshare.net/Pivotal/customer-spotlight-how-wellcare-accelerated-big-data-delivery-to-improve-analytics> with your colleagues.
Any questions?
- Attunity <http://learn.attunity.com/contact-us> can provide additional information about data movement. - If youâ€™re interested in big data solutions, please contact Pivotal <http://pivotal.io/contact>.
We look forward to sharing more insights with you at our next webinar!
Thanks, The Pivotal & Attunity Teams
